channel.title: Not sure what forum so ill use this
channel.description:
every time i run the compile file i get this up
C:\Documents and Settings\Owner\Desktop\20051104-server>javac *.java 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
C:\Documents and Settings\Owner\Desktop\20051104-server>pause Press any key to continue . . .
what does it mean and how can i make it work?

item.title: Not sure what forum so ill use this
item.dc:creator: @semu semu
item.description:
@semu wrote:

You need to install java… www.java.com and search for jdk 5.0
